item.title: Publications List
item.description: The reference publication: The Virtual MonteCarlo (presentation, paper) Hřivnáčová I et al 2003 Proc. of Computing in High Energy and Nuclear Physics (La Jolla) pp THJT006 (presentation at CHEP 2003, 24 - 28 March 2003, La Jolla, California) All publications listed in time reversed order: The Geant4 Virtual Monte Carlo (poster, paper) I Hřivnáčová 2012 J. Phys.: Conf. Ser. 396 022024 (poster at CHEP 2012, 21 - 25 May 2012, New York, USA)   Physics lists in Geant4 VMC presentation at ALICE-FAIR Computing Meeting, 28-29 April 2008, GSI   The Geant4 Virtual Monte Carlo (presentation, paper) I Hřivnáčová 2008 J.
